alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:01PM EDT until June 25 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN LIVINGSTON AND WASHTENAW COUNTIES... At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pinckney, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hamburg around 605 PM EDT. Brighton and Whitmore Lake around 610 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pittsfield Township, Whittaker, Plainfield, Hudson Mills Metropark, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Bridgewater, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake, Barton Hills and Pinckney State Recreation Area. People attending Howell High School should seek safe shelter immediately! TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
